interests.CanAdd: Ukuba awukwazi ukufumana oko ufuna, unokongeza umdla omtsha apha ngezantsi:
interests.TrySynonyms: Musa ukuyibona? Zama ezinye i synonyms.

chat.flaggedForAdminReview: Umyalezo ukhankanywe ukuphononongwa komphathi. Thepha kwakhona kwi-unflagga.
chat.closeChatConfirm: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukuvala le ngxoxo?

dialog.photoInstruction: Ukuba umntu okhangela ikhowudi yakho ye-QR phambi kwakho, thabatha umfanekiso wabo
dialog.title: Mema

notice.text: Umenywe. {{ClickOrTap}} apha ukuba wamkele kwaye ujoyine.

mobile.alert: Izimemo zithunyelwa ukusuka kwinani lethu, abahlobo bakho abangaziqondi. Landela ngokubhaliweyo okubhaliweyo ukuba ubazise isimemo esivela kuwe, ubacele ukuba banqakraze ikhonkco.
mobile.confirm: Izimemo zithunyelwa ukusuka kwinani lethu, abahlobo bakho abangaziqondi. Ngaba ungathanda ukulandelelana ngombhalo osheshayo ukuba ubazise isimemo esivela kuwe, ubacele ukuba banqakraze isiqhagamshelo.
mobile.check: Hayi, ndikuthumelele isimemo kwi-{{app}} insiza. Nceda ukhangele i-SMS yakho kwaye nqakraza isixhumanisi!

email.alert: Izimemo zithunyelwa kwi-domain yethu, apho abahlobo bakho abangaboniyo. Landela ngokubhaliweyo okubhaliweyo ukuba ubazise isimemo esivela kuwe, ubacele ukuba banqakraze ikhonkco.
email.confirm: Izimemo zithunyelwa kwi-domain yethu, apho abahlobo bakho abangaboniyo. Ngaba ungathanda ukulandelelana ngombhalo osheshayo ukuba ubazise isimemo esivela kuwe, ubacele ukuba banqakraze isiqhagamshelo.
email.subject: Ngaba ufumene isimemo?
email.body: Hayi, ndikuthumelele isimemo kwi-{{app}} insiza. Nceda ukhangele i-imeyile yakho kwaye nqakraza ikhonkco apha!
